title: MST3K KTMA K00 Green Slime
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0776194/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0776194/</a>

One of the three "Holy Grail" episodes...  This is not my own, but I did locate it.  I found it today using Google... surprisingly... as a recent update has caused that search engine to become wholly retarded.  It accidentally let a good result slip, and here it is.

The original torrent is located here:
http://www.utternerd.org/torrents/MST3K_K00_Green_Slime.torrent

It needs proliferation though.

It's a CAM rip of ALL of the host segments for "episode zero": The Green Slime.

Features an intro by Joel and Company, and a few moments of a strong desire to shoot the camera man with multiple tranquilizer darts.  He does finally stop fidgeting with the ******* tripod and eventually reveals the highest quality digital download available for the entire KTMA era.  It's short, it's awesome, it's nostalgic...

The only things keeping it from being perfect are the lack of the rest of the film, someone taking a potty break in the middle, and the camera man's failed experiment with caffeine.

Damn good though, worth the download.  This torrent will remain perpetually speedy with such a large fan base desiring it (I think my download was done in like... I don't know... 30 seconds?).

Enjoy.  And keep circulating those "tapes".
